Pre-Apocalypse[]: Nothing is known about Penny's life prior to or as the outbreak began.
Post-Apocalypse[]: At some point in the apocalypse, Penny joined a community called the Hilltop Colony . Penny and Felix are instructed by Yumiko Okumura to scout the nearby area and radio back as soon as they spot the Whisperers. Unfortunately while scouting, the pair are captured and hanged by the Whisperers. Their reanimated corpses are discovered by the caravan Daryl is leading at a roadblock created by Negan Smith .
Death[]: Killed By The Whisperers (Alive) Daryl Dixon , Lydia , or Dianne (Zombified) After being hanged by the Whisperers while out on patrol, a zombified Penny is found by the caravan of Hilltoppers heading towards Oceanside. Penny is then put down by either Daryl, Lydia, or Dianne.
Killed Victims[]: This list shows the victims Penny has killed: Possibly numerous counts of zombies
Trivia[]: Penny and Felix are the last named Hilltop residents introduced in the TV Series . In a deleted scene from Season 10, Yumiko thanks Daryl for bringing the bodies of Felix and Penny back to Hilltop.
Name: Penny
